posts.html:
SONAR AZ is an independent publication launched in May 2025 by Adam Petty. If you subscribe today, you'll get full access to the website as well as email newsletters about new content when it's available. Your subscription makes this site possible, and allows SONAR AZ to continue to exist. Thank you!

Access all areas

By signing up, you'll get access to the full archive of everything that's been published before and everything that's still to come. Your very own private library.

Fresh content, delivered

Stay up to date with new content sent straight to your inbox! No more worrying about whether you missed something because of a pesky algorithm or news feed.

Meet people like you

Join a community of other subscribers who share the same interests.

Start your own thing

Enjoying the experience? Get started for free and set up your very own subscription business using Ghost, the same platform that powers this website.
posts.plaintext:
SONAR AZ is an independent publication launched in May 2025 by Adam Petty. If you subscribe today, you'll get full access to the website as well as email newsletters about new content when it's available. Your subscription makes this site possible, and allows SONAR AZ to continue to exist. Thank you!


Access all areas

By signing up, you'll get access to the full archive of everything that's been published before and everything that's still to come. Your very own private library.


Fresh content, delivered

Stay up to date with new content sent straight to your inbox! No more worrying about whether you missed something because of a pesky algorithm or news feed.


Meet people like you

Join a community of other subscribers who share the same interests.


Start your own thing

Enjoying the experience? Get started for free and set up your very own subscription business using Ghost, the same platform that powers this website.

posts.title: Offerings
posts.lexical:
{"root":{"children":[{"type":"callout","version":1,"calloutText":"

"SONAR is for finding your home. Those providing unique and ecclectic programs find resources, support and encouragement, and those wanting to find themselves find connection and commitment."

","calloutEmoji":"","backgroundColor":"blue"},{"type":"markdown","version":1,"markdown":"## Creativity-Inspired Psychoeducation Discover how creativity supports mental health and well-being. These guided workshops blend expressive arts, storytelling, and play to help you understand yourself and connect with others. Through hands-on activities, you’ll build emotional skills, expand your sense of safety, and find new ways to express what words alone can’t. Each session offers a safe space to reflect and grow without judgment. Whether you’re new to group work or a seasoned seeker, you’ll gain insights and creative practices that inspire lasting healing and connection. [ **Explore Upcoming Education Opportunities** ] ## Art & Sound Workshops Explore visual art, sound art, and narrative art in workshops designed to cultivate calmness, centeredness, and authentic action. Guided by local and visiting artists, these sessions invite you to slow down, meditate, and refine your unique voice through painting, sculpting, storytelling, or experimental sound. Each gathering is a chance to reconnect with your inner world, discover new ways to express yourself, and bring creative visions to life in an inspiring, supportive atmosphere. [ **Join Art / Sound Workshops** ] ## Modern Music Masterclasses & Performances SONAR supports modern composers and musicians whose voices are often overlooked in traditional venues. Our masterclasses and performances create space for contemporary sounds and bold new ideas. Residencies give music groups dedicated time to develop, rehearse, and share original work. Local and visiting artists offer intimate concerts and hands-on learning that inspire both audiences and emerging talent. Whether you’re a performer, composer, or curious listener, join us in amplifying the next generation of sound. [ **View Masterclasses & Concerts** ] [](http://)"},{"children":[],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"root","version":1}}
posts.html:
"SONAR is for finding your home. Those providing unique and ecclectic programs find resources, support and encouragement, and those wanting to find themselves find connection and commitment."

Creativity-Inspired Psychoeducation

Discover how creativity supports mental health and well-being. These guided workshops blend expressive arts, storytelling, and play to help you understand yourself and connect with others. Through hands-on activities, you’ll build emotional skills, expand your sense of safety, and find new ways to express what words alone can’t. Each session offers a safe space to reflect and grow without judgment. Whether you’re new to group work or a seasoned seeker, you’ll gain insights and creative practices that inspire lasting healing and connection.

[ Explore Upcoming Education Opportunities ]

Art & Sound Workshops

Explore visual art, sound art, and narrative art in workshops designed to cultivate calmness, centeredness, and authentic action. Guided by local and visiting artists, these sessions invite you to slow down, meditate, and refine your unique voice through painting, sculpting, storytelling, or experimental sound. Each gathering is a chance to reconnect with your inner world, discover new ways to express yourself, and bring creative visions to life in an inspiring, supportive atmosphere.

[ Join Art / Sound Workshops ]

Modern Music Masterclasses & Performances

SONAR supports modern composers and musicians whose voices are often overlooked in traditional venues. Our masterclasses and performances create space for contemporary sounds and bold new ideas. Residencies give music groups dedicated time to develop, rehearse, and share original work. Local and visiting artists offer intimate concerts and hands-on learning that inspire both audiences and emerging talent. Whether you’re a performer, composer, or curious listener, join us in amplifying the next generation of sound.

[ View Masterclasses & Concerts ]
posts.plaintext:
"SONAR is for finding your home. Those providing unique and ecclectic programs find resources, support and encouragement, and those wanting to find themselves find connection and commitment."


Creativity-Inspired Psychoeducation


Discover how creativity supports mental health and well-being. These guided workshops blend expressive arts, storytelling, and play to help you understand yourself and connect with others. Through hands-on activities, you’ll build emotional skills, expand your sense of safety, and find new ways to express what words alone can’t. Each session offers a safe space to reflect and grow without judgment. Whether you’re new to group work or a seasoned seeker, you’ll gain insights and creative practices that inspire lasting healing and connection.


[ Explore Upcoming Education Opportunities ]



Art & Sound Workshops


Explore visual art, sound art, and narrative art in workshops designed to cultivate calmness, centeredness, and authentic action. Guided by local and visiting artists, these sessions invite you to slow down, meditate, and refine your unique voice through painting, sculpting, storytelling, or experimental sound. Each gathering is a chance to reconnect with your inner world, discover new ways to express yourself, and bring creative visions to life in an inspiring, supportive atmosphere.


[ Join Art / Sound Workshops ]



Modern Music Masterclasses & Performances


SONAR supports modern composers and musicians whose voices are often overlooked in traditional venues. Our masterclasses and performances create space for contemporary sounds and bold new ideas. Residencies give music groups dedicated time to develop, rehearse, and share original work. Local and visiting artists offer intimate concerts and hands-on learning that inspire both audiences and emerging talent. Whether you’re a performer, composer, or curious listener, join us in amplifying the next generation of sound.


[ View Masterclasses & Concerts ]

posts.title: Bookings
posts.html:
Book a Session or Workshop

At SONAR, we make it easy to reserve your spot for our workshops, masterclasses, concerts, or private studio sessions. Whether you’re looking to join an upcoming group, host a custom workshop, or book time for your creative project, we’re here to help you make it happen. Tell us what you’re interested in below and we’ll be in touch to confirm the details!

Workshops & Group Events

Register for psycheducation, art, and sound workshops.
Explore Offerings

Masterclasses & Performances

Reserve your spot for special concerts or musician masterclasses.
View Masterclasses & Concerts

Private Sessions & Studio Time

Book private recording sessions, artist residencies, or one-on-one consultations.
Request Studio Booking

Book a Session or Workshop

Use the form below to request a workshop, masterclass, concert seat, private session, or studio time. We’ll follow up within 2 business days to confirm details.
posts.plaintext:
Book a Session or Workshop


At SONAR, we make it easy to reserve your spot for our workshops, masterclasses, concerts, or private studio sessions. Whether you’re looking to join an upcoming group, host a custom workshop, or book time for your creative project, we’re here to help you make it happen. Tell us what you’re interested in below and we’ll be in touch to confirm the details!



Workshops & Group Events


Register for psycheducation, art, and sound workshops.

Explore Offerings



Masterclasses & Performances


Reserve your spot for special concerts or musician masterclasses.

View Masterclasses & Concerts



Private Sessions & Studio Time


Book private recording sessions, artist residencies, or one-on-one consultations.

Request Studio Booking








Book a Session or Workshop



Use the form below to request a workshop, masterclass, concert seat, private session, or studio time.
We’ll follow up within 2 business days to confirm details.









What would you like to book?
Workshop
Masterclass
Concert
Private Session
Studio Time
Residency








Request Booking
